code: import{GET_ITEMS,ADD_ITEMS,DELETE_ITEMS,ITEMS_LOADING}from"./types";import Axios from"axios";import{tokenConfig}from"./authAction";import{returnErrors}from"./errorAction";export var getItems=function getItems(){return function(dispatch){dispatch(setItemsLoading());Axios.get("/api/items").then(function(res){return dispatch({type:GET_ITEMS,payload:res.data});});};};export var addItem=function addItem(name){return function(dispatch,getState){console.log(name);Axios.post("/api/items",name,tokenConfig(getState)).then(function(res){return dispatch({type:ADD_ITEMS,item:res.data});}).catch(function(err){return dispatch(returnErrors(err.response.data,err.response.status));});};};export var deleteItem=function deleteItem(id){return function(dispatch,getState){console.log(id);Axios.delete("/api/items/".concat(id),tokenConfig(getState)).then(function(res){return dispatch({type:DELETE_ITEMS,DataId:id});}).catch(function(err){return dispatch(returnErrors(err.response.data,err.response.status));});};};export var setItemsLoading=function setItemsLoading(){return{type:ITEMS_LOADING};};
